required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021

clinical_study.brief_title: OxyGap : Comparaison Between Different Pulse Oximeter and With the Arterial Blood Gase
clinical_study.official_title: OxyGap : Comparaison Between Different Pulse Oximeter and With the Arterial Blood

brief_summary.textblock:
The oximeter is used to monitor intensive care patients undergoing oxygen therapy. It indicates pulsed oxygen saturation (SpO2), a reflection of arterial oxygen saturation (SaO2) which enables detection of hypoxemia and hyperoxia, both deleterious state. Current SpO2 recommendations aim to reduce both risk of hypoxemia and hyperoxia. SpO2 is considered the 5th vital sign.
Current recommendations for SpO2 targets do not consider the variability of oximeters used in clinical practice. This variability and lack of specification represent an obstacle to an optimal practice of oxygen therapy.
Thus, this study aims to compare the SpO2 values of different oximeters (Nonin, Masimo, Philips, Nellcor) used in clinical practice with the SaO2 reference value obtained by an arterial gas in order to specify the precision and the systematic biases of the oximeters studied. This data will also make it possible to refine the recommendations concerning optimal oxygenation

primary_outcome.measure: Difffence between Nellcor SpO2 and the SaO2 value
primary_outcome.description: Difffence between Nellcor oximeter SpO2 and the SaO2 value

primary_outcome.measure: Difffence between FreeO2 SpO2 and the SaO2 value
primary_outcome.description: Difffence between Nonin (FreeO2) oximeter SpO2 and the SaO2 value

primary_outcome.measure: Difffence between Nonin ear clip and the SaO2 value
primary_outcome.description: Difffence between Nonin (ear sensor) oximeter SpO2 and the SaO2 value

primary_outcome.measure: Difffence between Masimo SpO2 and the SaO2 value
primary_outcome.description: Difffence between Masimo oximeter SpO2 and the SaO2 value

primary_outcome.measure: Difffence between Philips SpO2 and the SaO2 value
primary_outcome.description: Difffence between Philips oximeter SpO2 and the SaO2 value

primary_outcome.measure: Difffence between Contect SpO2 and the SaO2 value
primary_outcome.description: Difffence between Contec oximeter SpO2 and the SaO2 value

primary_outcome.measure: Difffence between Bejing choice SpO2 and the SaO2 value
primary_outcome.description: Difffence between Bejing choice oximeter SpO2 and the SaO2 value

secondary_outcome.description: % of pairs with overestimation and underestimation of SaO2 for each oximeter.
Ability to detect hypoxemia (SpO2 below 90% and PaO2 < 60 mmHg)
Ability to detect hyperoxemia (SpO2 above 95% and PaO2 > 100 mmHg)
Average of the SpO2 value gaps between the different oximeters tested
Comparison of the finger sensor and ear clip sensor for Nonin oximeter

intervention.description: Serveral pulse oximeter will be place on patient find few minutes before arterial blood gases. During an arterial blood sample, all SpO2 will be recordered

study_pop.textblock: All patient in ICU with arterial catheter already installed will be consider.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ≥ 18 years old
- Patients admitted to the Intensive Care Unit
- Artery catheter already installed
Exclusion Criteria:
- No signal with the oximeter
- Pigmented nails or nail polish
- Methemoglobinemia
- Patient in isolation (multi-resistant bacteria, C-Difficile, COVID-19…)
- Prone position
